name: REST
description: Representational State Transfer: Architectural style for designing networked applications using standard HTTP methods

name: JSON
description: JavaScript Object Notation: Lightweight data interchange format that is easy for humans to read and write

name: XML
description: Extensible Markup Language: Markup language that defines rules for encoding documents in a format that is both human-readable and machine-readable

name: OAuth
description: Open Authorization: Standard for access delegation, commonly used for token-based authentication

name: OpenAPI Specification
description: Specification for machine-readable interface files for describing, producing, consuming, and visualizing RESTful web services

name: FHIR
description: HL7 Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIR): A standard describing data formats and elements and an application programming interface for exchanging electronic health records

name: HL7 V3
description: Health Level 7 Version 3, an XML-based messaging framework for health data exchange and interoperability.

name: HL7 V2
description: Health Level 7 Version 2, a messaging standard for exchanging clinical and administrative data in healthcare settings.

name: ADX
description: Aggregate Data Exchange standard for exchanging aggregate health data, commonly used in public health reporting and statistical analysis.

name: DICOM
description: Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine, a standard for medical imaging data exchange.
